column4: is there a good way to setup a proxy i can relay all web traffic through?
its pretty much just an install and works out of the box for most simple scenarios
you know about tor + torbutton right?
whats the advantage of tor over squid?
tor allows you to browse anonymously, and squid is a cahcing web proxy -- litle different
what do you mean id have to run squid locally?
i said "if" you are runing squid locally -- but i think it is better to run it for many LAN hosts
but if squid is running on my desktop i could use it to relay traffic from the laptop right?
